name: Roll A Ball (The Captain Moo)
description:
Welcome to a project of mine: Roll A Ball. This project has has been fixed from it's broken state and is being re-released and is in a new (working) development. For any support or questions enter it in the comments below. 

Controls:  These controls currently are designed for people who are more handy with a touchscreen or mouse than with a keyboard

Is there a Mobile Version...kind of as it is being submitted to the store and will be available shortly

Follow the Youtube video to create your own versions
